extendedInfo.description: The white tiger is a recessive mutant of the Bengal tiger, which was reported in the wild from time to time in Assam, Bengal, Bihar and especially from the former State of Rewa. They can be found in many Zoo around the world. Here we created a cube live Wallpaper from wallpaper of white tiger and added lighting and particle effects for you to show off the capabilities of your new Android phone. Features include:Options for transparent box2 different light sourceOption to move lightOption to change viewing angle and change background color.Option for Auto rotation with speed control, or manual control with finger swipe.Contains Ads in this Free Version
